title: Introducing Rouleur’s women’s newsletter
content:
February 05, 2021

Produced in association with Rapha, we'd like to introduce our brand new women's newsletter

This month marks a historic issue of Rouleur. Issue 101, on sale here, will be the first issue of Rouleur focused exclusively on women in the sport. This, of course, does not mean that it is written exclusively for women - great stories are great stories.

Related – Cover Stories: Issue 101

In addition to our print issue, we will be increasing our focus on women’s cycling digitally too. In association with Rapha, our women’s newsletter will be a weekly helping of the best stories around racing, gear and cycling culture.

If you’re already a Chronicle subscriber, you’ll already receive our women’s newsletter, otherwise please sign up below.

Subscribe to our women's newsletter, 

produced in association with Rapha, to receive

a weekly complement of racing, gear and cycling

culture focussed on women

The Desire Emporium was built by cyclists to bring together the coolest cycling brands under one roof. From curated clothing capsules, to exceptional lifestyle products and perfect gifts.
